Title: Update Author from GameBanana
UpdateAuthorsDescription: Update all mod authors from GameBanana
SmartUpdateDescription: Only update mods with unknown or missing authors
FetchAuthorsDescription: Fetch and update author information from GameBanana
SkipInvalidUrlsDescription: Skip mods that have been marked with invalid URLs
ConfirmFetchAuthors: This will fetch and update author information from GameBanana for all mods. Do you want to continue?
ConfirmFetchDates: This will fetch and update date information from GameBanana for all mods. Do you want to continue?
ConfirmFetchVersions: This will fetch and update version information from GameBanana for all mods. Do you want to continue?
CancelledContent: The update operation was cancelled by the user.
UpdateOtherDataButton_Tooltip: Updates NSFW tags and other metadata from GameBanana
ConfirmUpdateOtherData: This will update NSFW tags and other metadata from GameBanana for all mods with URLs. Continue?
FetchAllPreviewsButton_Tooltip: Downloads preview images for all mods
ConfirmFetchAllPreviews: This will download preview images from GameBanana for all mods, overwriting existing ones. Do you want to continue?
PreviewModeDialogContent: Choose how to handle existing previews:
FetchMissingPreviewsButton_Tooltip: Downloads preview images only for mods without previews
ConfirmFetchMissingPreviews: This will download preview images from GameBanana for mods that don't have previews yet. Do you want to continue?
